thread.title: Target-Date Funds Adjust for a Stock Pullback

author: Michael A. Pollock
title: Target-Date Funds Adjust for a Stock Pullback
text:
Many target-date funds face a challenge in this long bull market for stocks: Their high exposure to equities could result in a sharp drop in their value during a major stock-market pullback.
To damp the possible impact of such a downturn, managers of many of these funds are diversifying into new types of investmentsâ€”even as some also boost their stock exposure in hopes of getting better long-term returns and keeping up with competitors.
...
